attributes.action: introduce a minimum whole life sentence with no parole for the murder of a Police officer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Police officers risk their lives everyday for our saftey yet they are assaulted by criminals who know that they will only get a slap on the wrist. We feel that it is time to introduce a law which will give a mandatory whole life sentance to anyone who murders a police officer. This will send a strong message to all those criminals who go out armed and offer the police a degree of protection which is not currently offered to them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
